menuItems.content: The final line-up of 6 players in this double round-robin event was announced last week. Since then there has been a change as Dutch Grandmaster, Anish Giri, decided to withdraw due to growing concerns around the Covid-19 situation in the Netherlands...
menuItems.title: Jan-krzysztof Duda to replace anish giri in tournament

menuItems.content: GM Nodirbek Abdusattorov won the 19th Speed Chess Championship Grand Prix, his first victory in the series. The Uzbek grandmaster beat the GM Jose Martinez of Peru 1.5-0.5 in the knockout final. The final Speed Chess Championship Grand Prix...
menuItems.title: Abdusattorov Wins 19th Speed Chess Grand Prix

menuItems.content: The Starter was published in national newspapers and appeared on their websites. 947 Solutions were submitted, 635 of them correct, and 312 incorrect...
